short_desc: Provides service coordination to enable homeless individuals with disabilities to access housing
description: RISE is a collaborative program providing integrated services coordination and a range of social services to help homeless individuals with one or more disabilities find and maintain housing. Services are provided on-site, through home visits, and in the community. Offers: Emergency and Transitional Shelter; Alcohol and Drug Treatment; Mental Health Treatment/Support Services; Health Education and Treatment Advocacy; Life Skills Training; Housing Search Assistance; Vocational Assessment and Employment Services; Veteran Specific Services.
